mainContent.heading: What is the Nutrition Facts Section?
paragraphs: The Nutrition Facts section is designed to present nutritional values and ingredient information in a clear, easy-to-read format.
It helps food, supplement, and wellness brands provide transparency while maintaining a clean and professional storefront design.
This section can be added to product pages or informational pages to support customer decision-making.

features.title: Nutritional Values
features.description: Add calories, macros, vitamins, and other nutritional data based on your product.

features.title: Serving Information
features.description: Display serving size, servings per container, and daily value percentages.

features.title: Ingredient List
features.description: Show ingredients and allergen information in a structured layout.

features.title: Layout & Styling
features.description: Adjust typography, borders, and colors to match your brand style.
